remarks: Commutative law for the scalar product of a normed complex vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Feb-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvscl.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvscl.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
nvscom $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( A S ( B S C ) ) = ( B S ( A S C ) ) ) $.
